name: Harry and Larry
description:
CARTOON ACTION AND ADVENTURE
• Immerse yourself in the colorful world of Harry and Larry
• Watch the animated storyline for some laughs in between levels

FAST-PACED OBSTACLE DODGING
• Fly through 24 grocery aisle levels to complete the Grocery Run obstacle course
• Dodge hilarious obstacles such as fish crates, snowballs, tires, and other hazards
• Discover what lurks inside the mysterious Employees Only section (you know you've always wondered!)

DOZENS OF DELICIOUS TREATS TO COLLECT
• Pineapples, candy canes, cupcakes, and many more treats await you
• Re-play each level and collect all the treats to get a Perfect Record

DISCOVER AMAZING ABILITIES
• Get temporary invincibility and knock back those pesky fish crates
• Grab a one-time shield to protect against hazards
• Bounce off the bumpers to get extra treats
• Fly through the speed-up and speed-down chambers to change your speed (and the music tempo!)

MEMORABLE SOUNDTRACK
• Enjoy epic melodies while you play
• Unlock the Retro Mode soundtrack by collecting all the treats

ONE FINGER CONTROL
• One finger moves Harry and Larry up and down, while they automatically fly forward
• Works left-handed or right-handed
• Challenge your reflexes as the levels get faster

PLAY IT ANYWHERE YOU WANT
• Play it on the subway. In a forest. Or even the Grocery store if you're feeling bored!
(or to put it another way: internet connection not required to play once downloaded!)
• No ads
• No in-app purchases


Play it now and conquer the Grocery Run with the Harry and Larry twins!
